::Scorponok/Zarak::

While Zarak was looking at Jotunn he missed Remus's attack. The one blade sticks into Scorponok's tail, damaging the fusion blaster within it.

Zarak: Ahhh! Damn you, Maximal!

Zarak transforms back to Scorponok's head and Scorponok targets Remus with all his body mounted laser batteries and opens fire.

khamkain <khamkain@...> wrote:                               The tail of scorponok was to fast for Remus in this form, he wanted to
 avoid close combat but staying in this hover mode will diavantaged him
 a lot more. The shock of the tail pushed him on a wall him. As he get
 up on his feet again, he transform to his bot form. He was taller than
  scorponok and his tail was quick : he had to watch out. Has he was
 thinking about his next move. Jotunn landed near them and Zarak came
 out of Scorponok : This figth was starting to look very bad. The two
 shot were the diversion Remsu needed: he took out the small blade
 underhis wings, then he rushed on Scorponok trying to hit the tail
 leaving the other blade to block a possible counter shot.
 
 MEANWHILE
 
 Motherload was coming rigth at Grimlock. He didn't made a move to
 avoid the hit, instead he bitted the punch an block with his hand. The
  hit was strong and Grimlock slide backward without loosing any of his
 stability. While motherload was still in his range, Grimlock turn
 around to give him a tail attack. 
 
 Grimlock : Grimlock have fun. Grimlock not figth long time.
 
 MEANWHILE
 
 Razorwing was getting in control of the situation again. Grimlock was
 fithging motherload, Deadfur had taken great preparation for the waves
 of preds. Remus was still untacable and Jotunn neither.
 
 RAzorwing opened a comlink : Remus? Remus what is yours status?
 Remus :  I'm.... (some explosion and metal hit were clearly being
 heard) I'm trying to hold down Scorponok and ... Uhn!... and
 Zarack.... Damn is good ... there's also this guy Jotunn..... but... I
 may...... scrchhhh 
 
 the rest of the comm went out.
 
 Razorwing : Stay in contact Deadfur i'm going to get this Jotunn i'll
 leave you in charge of this front, give me all devellopement here....
 Remus i'm coming.  Razorwing transform! 
 
 Razorwing transformed and flew out to find Remus and Jotunn.
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 >
 > ::Lord Elder::
 > 
 > After dealing with one of the Predacon fliers Elder continues on his
 way to Relay. Elder leaps onto the battlefield.

 >

 opens a comm to Deadfur.
 > 
 > Elder: I'm here and engaging the Predacons!
 > 
 > Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:                               Deadfur:
 Razorwing, that you? This is not going well, we got this
 >  special kind of Preds, and I think even Lord Jotunn's here. I think he

 >  licked her side.

 >  myself!
 >

 >

 >  no ordinary Maximal. Bring me over this scorpion thing there first.
 >  
 >  He rose from his command seat and opened the hatch, the jumped off as
 >  she took him above Skorponok.
 >  
 >  Free to fight, Motherload transformed into a large armored bot and
 >  flew right at Grimlock, preparing to punch him right in the jaw...
 >

 intercept, but

 preferring to

 some cover
